title: HMSI recalls 300-350 cc bikes to replace faulty parts
description: Honda Motorcycle & Scooter India is recalling certain units of its CB350 and H'ness CB350 models due to issues with the wheel speed sensor and camshaft. The recall affects bikes manufactured between October 2020 and April 2024. The company will replace the affected parts free of cost at its BigWing dealerships across India.
